Html.name: Html0
Html.content: A page can be dropped right below another existing page or as a child page of an existing page. If you want to place the page 2 as child page of page 1, hover over the icon of page 1. Then page 2 will become a child page of it - if dragged right below. A child page can also be created via the "Create child page" context menu entry on an existing page.
